name: Slomins
0:
”Alexa, tell alarm oh to arm away”
”Alexa, ask alarm oh to give me my panel status”
”Alexa, tell alarm oh to set the temperature to 73 degrees fahrenheit”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: alarm oh
des: Leveraging the SecureNet Platform, Slomins is the most responsive Interactive Security and Home Control app in the market. The Slomins App, Web Portal and now Alexa skill, give you complete control over your security system, lights, locks, thermostats and other connected devices from anywhere in the world.
